review: This is a simple to use and intuitive thing, that does not create more clutter and work just fine, all the time
author: Cyrill KALITA

review: I bought this because I thought it can mirror anything from my iPad or my desktop, but it only mirror content from YouTube and Netflix.  It doesn't mirror that well for some website content.  But it's kind of cool that you can mirror video from iPhone through You Tube.
author: C. Chan "Chris"

review: We had been using our Macmini to stream TV onto our TV with an HDMI cable.  But, the squinting and trying to see the screen from the chair was a pain.  We decided to try out the chrome cast.  It's awesome!  I can control the TV on my phone from my chair.  It's wonderful.  How can any competitor compete with the price of $35?
author: C Murphy

author: Hemant

review: Love this product. We had to increase our download speed for it to work properly (had a somewhat slow speed before) and it's amazing! So easy to set up and now we're streaming all of our favorite movie and tv apps to our tv. Would highly recommend!
author: Tricia Muccigrosso

review: Works really good, put it on the living room TV, you can watch Netflix, Youtube, any videos you have on your tablet and music. For the price you can't beat it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Save your money and buy a HDMI cable to run from your laptop to your HD flatscreen. The Google thing took 5.5 hours to update its software and when it finally started to worked the picture quality was the worst I've ever seen, worse than VHS tape. the product is a joke, a $30 joke. and it's not my ADSL or network either, i can watch HD (720p) videos, full screen just fine using either my new desktop or my old laptop with an HDMI cable.
author: R. A. Majestic

review: I have a blue ray in the living room that allows us to stream Netflix and other video apps but I didn't want to buy a blue ray for every room. Well this is the best solution for that. I can stream netflix, youtube and my movies off of vudu on this very inexpensive device plus I can move it from room to room if I want to. I love it and it's easy to use.
author: Catherine Brewer

review: Wished they have more apps that supports the system for usage with the smartphone. Overall great, one less cable now running from my laptop to my television.
